commit.message: Implement EC2 and GCP instance check

nodes.bodyText: make this call in UpdateCheck instance so that we query the metadata service only once and not for each call like isCFT  / isEMR? try to minimize the metadata service calls needed
nit: instead of reading the entire file, read a limited number of bytes into a buffer of length=content.size only?
